name: Advanced Charter & Instruction
about: Advanced Charter & Instruction is a privately owned flight school located at John Wayne Airport in Orange County, CA. We offer accelerated and self-paced scenario-based flight training tailored for both career-oriented students and individuals seeking to fly for leisure. Our instructors are held to the highest national standards, providing meticulous and comprehensive training. We boast a fleet of well-maintained Cessna 172S and Cirrus SR22 aircraft. Our smaller operation ensures personalized attention, treating students like family and prioritizing their success. With a focus on aeronautical knowledge and piloting skills, we aim to prepare students thoroughly for their certificates and ratings. Our mission is to deliver exceptional flight training in a supportive and professional environment.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Multi-Pilot License (MPL)
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating"]
